product_name: Womo Designs Chassis with Garmin Handlebar Mount
long_description: Designed to securely hold your Garmin 500 or 800 series bike computer in an easy-to-read position while you ride, the Womo Designs Chassis with Garmin Handlebar Mount frees up handlebar space. The Womo Designs Chassis with Garmin Handlebar Mount is machined from aircraft grade aluminum giving to create high rigidity for extra stability. Accepts an additional accessory kit so you can attach a GoPro Camera or NiteRider bike light in addition to your Garmin, accessory kits sold separately. This item includes only the WomoDesigns Chassis with Garmin Handlebar Mount; Garmin bike computers are sold separately. Compatible with 31.8mm diameter handlebars; anodized and laser etched.
short_description: Designed to securely hold your Garmin 500 or 800 series bike computer in an easy-to-read position while you ride, the Womo Designs Chassis with Garmin Handlebar Mount frees up handlebar space.
